comments:
Fresh installation of Eclipse Platform 3.2. Chose "Software Updates" -> "Find New", chose the Callisto Discovery Site.

Next dialog appears with a tree control containing all available updates, in a "collapsed" state. While expanding one of the items (I believe it was the "Modelling" item), a dialog saying "An error has occured, please refer to the log file" appears.

Log file contains the following exception:
